Original:
我是2021/3/20在台北英迪格結婚的新娘,
過了這麼久才來補上評論,
實在是很多感謝和感動需要醞釀🥰
客製化酒水讓我們這場婚禮更增添色彩,
很貼心地連調酒的攤位都佈置成我們婚禮的色系🥰
完全大愛❤️非常推薦❤️
EN:
I am 2021/3/20 a bride married in Yingdig, Taipei,
After so long, come to make up for the comment,
There are really many thanks and touches that need to be brewed 🥰
Customized alcohol make our wedding even more color,
Very intimately even the bartending stalls are arranged as the color of our wedding 🥰
Complete love ❤️ Very recommended ❤️

Original:

EN:
The bartender is great, the bartender service is very good, and I know wine very well, but I specialize in the taste I like

French fries with homemade tomato cream cheese sauce are delicious, thinking that it is Mei Niji

Make the wedding particularly special 😚 ❤️

Really recommended 👍🏻
